alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 3:34AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Harrison and Jackson Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 334 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gulf Park Estates, or near Ocean Springs, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Biloxi, Ocean Springs, St. Martin, Gautier, D`iberville, Wade, Latimer, Gulf Hills, Vancleave, Gulf Park Estates, Hickory Hills and Hurley. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 43 and 64. Interstate 110 in Mississippi near mile marker 1, and between mile markers 3 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
